query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST1142 ( MANDT, SUVSN, SUVPRH, HTSER, INORDER, APPLYFLOOR, SUVPRD, CALPRD, MODYPRD, ERDAT, ERZET, ERNAM, AEDAT, AEZET, AENAM ) SELECT MANDT, SUVSN, -- 앞에 있는 번호 하나 증가 시켜 줌. SUVPRH, #MAX_HTSER#, INORDER, APPLYFLOOR, SUVPRD, CALPRD, MODYPRD, ERDAT, ERZET, ERNAM, AEDAT, AEZET, AENAM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST1137 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUVSN = #SUVSN#
